generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved surface with white lane markings and crosswalks, which is characteristic of a road.
- sidewalk: The paved area on the right side of the road, bordered by curbs and trees, is designated for pedestrians and is clearly a sidewalk.
- building: Multiple buildings are visible along both sides of the street, including residential and commercial structures.
- vegetation: Trees are prominently visible along the sidewalks and streets, indicating the presence of vegetation.
- terrain: Small patches of grass and soil are visible along the edges of the sidewalk and road, classifying them as terrain.
- sky: A portion of the sky is visible above the trees and buildings, appearing as an open area without leaves.
- person: A person is visible walking on the sidewalk on the right side of the image.
- car: Multiple cars are visible parked along the street and in the foreground, including a black SUV directly in front of the camera.
- traffic sign: A blue circular traffic sign with a downward arrow is visible on a pole on the left side of the road.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including the one holding the traffic sign and others along the sidewalk.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is partially visible parked on the left side of the road, near the curb.
